Name: Voxel Battle Simulator
About the game: Voxel Battle Simulator is a voxel-based tactical game. Deploy your units on the battlefield and watch as the struggle unfolds in this simple and humorous, voxel-based tactical game. Featuring 90 levels of a single player campaign spread across 6 different world environments. Pit units against each other in the sandbox mode and see which army comes out on top once everything turns to rubble. Strategize the flow of battle Deploy the units Observe the battle unfold Destroy environment Compete with your friends in a local multiplayer Can you overcome all the challenges throughout different environments, adapt upon seeing different enemy strategies and fulfill the expectations of the general. Unlock new units and upgrade existing ones. Fully customize and plan your own battles. Fight against your friends in a local PvP mode. Play on 90 maps with a bunch of silly units.
